resources.string: Click on one of the following list items

This application contains various quotes about food. 

On the main screen, you can tap a category to view its related quotes. Tapping on a short quote will display the full quote, and information about who said it. Tapping on the quote attribution will display a small blurb about who originally said it. Tapping on the "Reference" link will open a web browser, displaying the page this quote was found on. 

The options menu, visible by tapping the three dots at the top of any page, contains a number of options. The "About" option will display the page you are viewing right now! The "Random quote" option will display a random quote from a random category. The "Last quote viewed" option will display the last quote you have seen.
Created by Lyrene Labor and Peter Bellefleur
